page1.title: Welcome to spontify.me
page1.text:
• Your friends are away or don't have time?
  • Are you new in town?
  • Do you want to celebrate and are you looking for company?
  • Are you missing someone for shopping, cinema, sports, etc.?

page2.title: You're right here...
page2.text:
if you are spontaneously looking for like-minded people.

Warning, this is not a dating app!

We want to create friendships and spontaneity here and to suppress sex requests or the like.

page3.title: The Matching
page3.text:
• Attributes that you value in others
  • Age, Gender, Budget
  • Locations that you like together
  • Bluetooth matching, interesting e.g. at concerts to find suitable people within a radius of 10 meters

page4.title: We are Open...
page4.text:
• Open Source
  • Open Minded
  • Open Philosophy

We don't collect data for advertising.
We don't sell data.
Our goal is to bring authenticity and spontaneity to life.

info: The app is available in the Apple and Play Store, but also on the web at
